description: Analyzed customer trends using PostgreSQL and Python, presenting insights through Tableau.
Built a Tableau dashboard using Excel data to track regional performance metrics.
Modeled financial forecasts using Python and Jupyter notebooks with visual storytelling.
Used PostgreSQL and R to explore patterns in transactional retail data.
Created interactive PowerPoint visuals summarizing Python-driven analysis of survey data.
Streamlined monthly reports by integrating Excel calculations and PowerPoint automation.
